EmailTemplate.name: Contract Expire 60 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: A written agreement for {!Account.Name} - {!Account.Cust_ID__c} is expiring in 60 days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.OwnerFullName},
Please note that a written agreement for {!Account.Name} - {!Account.Cust_ID__c}, Contract Number: {!Contract.ContractNumber} is expiring in 60 days.
Expiration date: {!Contract.Date_current_Legal_Contract_expires__c}
Please note accounts can have multiple written agreement relationships. If you have questions regarding what relationship is expiring, please follow the process in #2 below.
Please choose from the following next steps:
To submit completed new/renewal documents – open a SCOE ticket from the account HERE. Choose Compliance → Document submission.
To ask question(s) about the expiring written agreement – open a SCOE ticket from the account HERE. Choose Compliance → Agreement question.
To initiate extensions/new written agreements - open a WRF from the account.
WRF quick reference…
Will this customer / Does this customer have a Written Agreement? → Yes What best describes your request? → Account Review What is the goal of the account review? → Contract term changes The account can be accessed HERE
If you have already acted on this, please disregard this notification.
PLEASE DO NOT REPLY TO THIS EMAIL.
Thank You,
The Pricing Compliance Team
